mapper.update: UPDATE usertb SET upassword = #{upassword }, uphone = #{uphone }, uaddress1 = #{uaddress1 }, uaddress2 = #{uaddress2 }, uaddress3 = #{uaddress3 } WHERE uemail = #{uemail }
mapper.select: SELECT ulogin FROM usertb WHERE uemail = #{uemail }

SELECT U.uname, U.uaddress2, A.applicantno, V.vol_sterm, V.vol_eterm, V.stime, V.etime, V.vol_place FROM volunteer V left join applicant A on (V.volunteerno=A.volunteerno) left join usertb U on (A.userno=U.userno) WHERE applicantno=${applicantno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (questionno, userno, question_title, question_content, pic) VALUES (#{questionno }, #{userno }, #{question_title }, #{question_content }, #{pic } )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, Z.* FROM ( SELECT V.vol_sterm, V.vol_eterm, V.stime, V.etime, V.vol_process, V.vol_title, D.departname, C.cname FROM applicant A, usertb U, volunteer V, v_department D, centertb C WHERE U.userno = A.userno AND V.volunteerno = A.volunteerno AND D.departmentno = V.department AND C.centerno = V.centerno AND U.userno = #{userno } ORDER BY A.applicantno DESC ) Z ORDER BY rnum ) applicant WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT V.vol_sterm, V.vol_eterm, V.stime, V.etime, V.vol_process, V.vol_title, D.departname, C.cname FROM applicant A, usertb U, volunteer V, v_department D, centertb C WHERE U.userno = A.userno AND V.volunteerno = A.volunteerno AND D.departmentno = V.department AND C.centerno = V.centerno AND U.userno = #{value } )
